attributes.action: Stop Building of ALL religious buildings
attributes.additional_details:
I believe that the building of ALL religious centres should stop, regardless of faith.
If I had my way and it was at all possible I would ban religion around the world.
In this country we have Health and safety to stop you tripping over, but yet we send 1,000 of men to lose lives and limbs for the protection of religious beliefs.
STOP Building Churches and Mosques now and it may just be the start of something.
